text: Hi everyone! Bas here, I'm an applied AI researcher and have been picking up Julia lately! Especially the metaprogramming interests me for easy and flexible meta-learning. Oh, and Julia's speed of course, who doesn't want to write a deep learning library in native Julia code :smirk:? Looking forward contributing where possible :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Hi everyone! Bas here, I'm an applied AI researcher and have been picking up Julia lately! Especially the metaprogramming interests me for easy and flexible meta-learning. Oh, and Julia's speed of course, who doesn't want to write a deep learning library in native Julia code

text: Welcome! Not sure which ML libraries you are particularly interested in. The Flux.jl team tend to be more active in Zulip than here: <https://julialang.zulipchat.com>

attachments.title: JuliaLang
attachments.text: This is the Zulip server for the Julia programming language community. We ask anyone joining to adhere to the Julia Code of Conduct. | To learn more about Julia, check out <https://julialang.org/>, or just come ask us here! | You can reach out to the admins of this Zulip by sending a direct message to @zulip-admins.
